If $a$, $b$ and $c$ are positive integers and $a$ and $b$ are odd, then $3^{a} + (b - 1)^{2}c$ is\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{odd for all choices of c} $\\
$ \textbf{(B)}\ \text{even for all choices of c} $\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \text{odd, if c is even; even, if c is odd} $\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ \text{odd, if c is odd; even, if c is even} $\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ \text{odd, if c is not a multiple of 3; even if c is a multiple of 3} $
